contract for a token bridge home that sends its specified token to {TokenRemote} instances. This contract also handles multi-hop transfers, where tokens sent from a {TokenRemote} instance are forwarded to another {TokenRemote} instance.","events":{"CollateralAdded(bytes32,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when tokens are added as collateral for a given TokenRemote instance. The event emits a {remaining} value of 0 when the TokenRemote instance is fully collateralized."},"MinTeleporterVersionUpdated(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `minTeleporterVersion` is updated."},"TeleporterAddressPaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when a Teleporter address is paused."},"TeleporterAddressUnpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when a Teleporter address is unpaused."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"getMinTeleporterVersion()":{"details":"Public getter for `_minTeleporterVersion`."},"isTeleporterAddressPaused(address)":{"details":"Checks if a Teleporter address is paused."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pauseTeleporterAddress(address)":{"details":"Pauses a Teleporter address from interacting with this contract. After pausing a Teleporter address, it will no longer be able to deliver messages to this contract, and this contract will not send messages through that Teleporter address. The address does not need to be registered with the Teleporter registry. Emits a {TeleporterAddressPaused} event if successfully paused. Requirements: - `_msgSender()` must have Teleporter upgrade access. - `teleporterAddress` is not the zero address. - `teleporterAddress` is not already paused."},"receiveTeleporterMessage(bytes32,address,bytes)":{"details":"See {ITeleporterReceiver-receiveTeleporterMessage} `nonReentrant` is a reentrancy guard that protects again multiple versions of the TeleporterMessengerContract delivering a message in the same call. Any internal calls will not be able to call functions also marked with `nonReentrant`. Requirements: - `_msgSender()` must be a Teleporter version greater than or equal to `minTeleporterVersion`."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"unpauseTeleporterAddress(address)":{"details":"Unpauses a Teleporter address from interacting with this contract. After unpausing a Teleporter address, it will again be able to deliver messages to this contract, and this contract can send messages through that Teleporter address. The address does not need to be registered with the Teleporter registry. Emits a {TeleporterAddressUnpaused} event if successfully unpaused. Requirements: - `_msgSender()` must have Teleporter upgrade access. - `teleporterAddress` is not the zero address. - `teleporterAddress` is already paused."},"updateMinTeleporterVersion(uint256)":{"details":"Updates the minimum Teleporter version allowed for delivering Teleporer messages to this contract. To prevent anyone from being able to call this function, which would disallow messages from old Teleporter versions from being received, this function should be safeguarded with access controls. This is done by overriding the implementation of {_checkTeleporterUpgradeAccess}."}},"stateVariables":{"bridgedBalances":{"details":"(remoteBlockchainID, remoteBridgeAddress) -> balance"}},"title":"TokenHome","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"CallFailed(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a call to a recipient contract to receive token fails, and the tokens are sent to a fallback recipient."},"CallSucceeded(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a call to a recipient contract to receive token succeeds."},"RemoteRegistered(bytes32,address,uint256,uint8)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new TokenRemote instance is registered with the token bridge."},"TokensAndCallRouted(bytes32,(bytes32,address,address,bytes,uint256,uint256,address,address,address,uint256,uint256),uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are routed from a mulit-hop send message, with calldata for a contract recipient, to another chain."},"TokensAndCallSent(bytes32,address,(bytes32,address,address,bytes,uint256,uint256,address,address,address,uint256,uint256),uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are sent to another chain with calldata for a contract recipient."},"TokensRouted(bytes32,(bytes32,address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address),uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are routed from a multi-hop send message to another chain."},"TokensSent(bytes32,address,(bytes32,address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,address),uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are sent to another chain."},"TokensWithdrawn(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are withdrawn from the token bridge contract."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"blockchainID()":{"notice":"The blockchain ID of the chain this contract is deployed on."},"bridgedBalances(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Tracks the balances of tokens sent to TokenRemote instances. Balances are represented in the remote token's denomination, and bridges are not allowed to unwrap more than has been sent to them."},"constructor":{"notice":"Initializes this home bridge instance to send tokens to TokenRemote instances on other chains."},"registeredRemotes(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Tracks the settings for each remote bridge instance. TokenRemote instances must register with their {TokenHome} contracts via Teleporter message to be able to receive tokens from this contract."},"tokenAddress()":{"notice":"The token address this home contract bridges to TokenRemote instances. For multi-hop transfers, this {tokenAddress} is always used to pay for the secondary message fees. If the token is an ERC20 token, the contract address is directly passed in. If the token is a native asset, the contract address is the wrapped token contract."}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/TokenHome/TokenHome.sol":"TokenHome"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@avalabs/subnet-evm-contracts@1.2.0/=lib/teleporter/contracts/lib/subnet-evm/contracts/",":@openzeppelin/contracts@4.8.1/=lib/teleporter/contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/",":@teleporter-mocks/=lib/teleporter/contracts/src/Mocks/",":@teleporter/=lib/teleporter/contracts/src/Teleporter/",":ds-test/=lib/forge-std/lib/ds-test/src/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":openzeppelin-contracts/=lib/teleporter/contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/",":subnet-evm/=lib/teleporter/contracts/lib/subnet-evm/",":teleporter/=lib/teleporter/"]},"sources":{"lib/teleporter/contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/access/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa94b34880e3c1b0b931662cb1c09e5dfa6662f31cba80e07c5ee71cd135c9673","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://40fb1b5102468f783961d0af743f91b9980cf66b50d1d12009f6bb1869cea4d2","dweb:/ipfs/QmYqEbJML4jB1GHbzD4cUZDtJg5wVwNm3vDJq1GbyDus8y"]},"lib/teleporter/contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/security/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x190dd6f8d592b7e4e930feb7f4313aeb8e1c4ad3154c27ce1cf6a512fc30d8cc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4ce8dfb62d0c4fa260d6eec8f1cd47f5f2a044e11bde5b31d18072fa6e7d9010","dweb:/ipfs/QmTyFztU3tLEcEDnqqiaW4UJetqsU77LXc6pjc9oTXCK5u"]},"lib/teleporter/contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4ffc0547c02ad22925310c585c0f166f8759e2648a09e9b489100c42f15dd98d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://15f52f51413a9de1ff191e2f6367c62178e1df7806d7880fe857a98b0b66253d","dweb:/ipfs/QmaQG1fwfgUt5E9nu2cccFiV47B2V78MM1tCy1qB7n4MsH"]},"lib/teleporter/contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9750c6b834f7b43000631af5cc30001c5f547b3ceb3635488f140f60e897ea6b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5a7d5b1ef5d8 isTeleporterAddressPaused(address).details: Checks if a Teleporter address is paused.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pauseTeleporterAddress(address).details: Pauses a Teleporter address from interacting with this contract. After pausing a Teleporter address, it will no longer be able to deliver messages to this contract, and this contract will not send messages through that Teleporter address. The address does not need to be registered with the Teleporter registry. Emits a {TeleporterAddressPaused} event if successfully paused. Requirements: - `_msgSender()` must have Teleporter upgrade access. - `teleporterAddress` is not the zero address. - `teleporterAddress` is not already paused.

receiveTeleporterMessage(bytes32,address.details: See {ITeleporterReceiver-receiveTeleporterMessage} `nonReentrant` is a reentrancy guard that protects again multiple versions of the TeleporterMessengerContract delivering a message in the same call. Any internal calls will not be able to call functions also marked with `nonReentrant`. Requirements: - `_msgSender()` must be a Teleporter version greater than or equal to `minTeleporterVersion`.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpauseTeleporterAddress(address).details: Unpauses a Teleporter address from interacting with this contract. After unpausing a Teleporter address, it will again be able to deliver messages to this contract, and this contract can send messages through that Teleporter address. The address does not need to be registered with the Teleporter registry. Emits a {TeleporterAddressUnpaused} event if successfully unpaused. Requirements: - `_msgSender()` must have Teleporter upgrade access. - `teleporterAddress` is not the zero address. - `teleporterAddress` is already paused.

updateMinTeleporterVersion(uint256).details: Updates the minimum Teleporter version allowed for delivering Teleporer messages to this contract. To prevent anyone from being able to call this function, which would disallow messages from old Teleporter versions from being received, this function should be safeguarded with access controls. This is done by overriding the implementation of {_checkTeleporterUpgradeAccess}.

blockchainID().notice: The blockchain ID of the chain this contract is deployed on.

bridgedBalances(bytes32,address).notice: Tracks the balances of tokens sent to TokenRemote instances. Balances are represented in the remote token's denomination, and bridges are not allowed to unwrap more than has been sent to them.

constructor.notice: Initializes this home bridge instance to send tokens to TokenRemote instances on other chains.

registeredRemotes(bytes32,address).notice: Tracks the settings for each remote bridge instance. TokenRemote instances must register with their {TokenHome} contracts via Teleporter message to be able to receive tokens from this contract.

tokenAddress().notice: The token address this home contract bridges to TokenRemote instances. For multi-hop transfers, this {tokenAddress} is always used to pay for the secondary message fees. If the token is an ERC20 token, the contract address is directly passed in. If the token is a native asset, the contract address is the wrapped token contract.

documentation.text:
@notice Sends tokens to the specified remote token bridge instance.
 @dev Increases the bridge balance sent to the remote bridge instance,
 and uses Teleporter to send a cross chain message. The amount passed is assumed to
 be already scaled to the local denomination for this token home.
 Requirements:
 - The TokenRemote instance specified by {input.destinationBlockchainID} and {input.destinationBridgeAddress} must
   be registered with this contract.
 - {input.recipient} cannot be the zero address
 - {amount} must be greater than 0

@notice Routes tokens from a multi-hop message to the specified remote token bridge instance.
 @dev Increases the bridge balance sent to the remote token bridge instance,
 and uses Teleporter to send a cross chain message. The amount passed is assumed to
 be already scaled to the local denomination for this token home.
 Requirements:
 - The TokenRemote instance specified by {input.destinationBlockchainID} and {input.destinationBridgeAddress} must
   be registered with this contract.
 - {input.recipient} cannot be the zero address
 - {amount} must be greater than 0
